Package es.send

package es.send
Implementation of the Bridge pattern for message sending functionality. Provides abstractions and implementations for sending messages through different channels.

Package Components:

  • SendAbstraction - Interface defining the abstraction:
    • Defines high-level message sending operations
    • Implemented by SendAbstractionImpl
  • SendImplementor - Interface for concrete implementations:
    • Defines platform-specific sending operations
    • Manages source Activity references
    • Implemented by SMS and WhatsApp concrete classes

Concrete Implementors:

  • SMSImplementor - SMS messaging implementation:
    • Uses Android's SMS sending Intent
    • Handles SMS URI formatting
  • WhatsAppImplementor - WhatsApp messaging implementation:
    • Uses WhatsApp's API URL format
    • Handles package availability checking
    • Manages phone number formatting

Usage:

  • Create a SendAbstractionImpl instance with desired method ("SMS" or "WhatsApp")
  • Use the send() method to send messages through the selected channel
  • Handles graceful fallback if sending method is unavailable

Design Pattern:

  • Implements the Bridge pattern to decouple abstraction from implementation
  • Allows independent variation of sending methods
  • Facilitates addition of new sending methods without modifying existing code
  • Class
    Description
    SendAbstraction
    Define la interfaz de la abstracción
    SendAbstractionImpl
    Implementa la interfaz de la abstraccion utilizando (delegando a) una referencia a un objeto de tipo implementor.
    SendImplementor
    Define la interfaz para las clases de la implementacion.
    SMSImplementor
    Concrete implementor utilizando la actividad de envío de SMS.
    WhatsAppImplementor
    Concrete implementor utilizando la aplicación de WhatsApp.
